data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Ali: The ending of that film was so cliched. I ____ it ____ a ____ away. I ____ screenwriters ____ take ____ risks ____ their ____.
Jim: I don't see ____ else ____ could ____ wrapped ____ up. In order to make the plot coherent, they needed to end the love story the way that they did.
data.partBlankContent:
Ali: The ending of that film was so cliched. I s__ it com___ a mi__ away. I wi__ screenwriters wo___ take mo__ risks wi__ their pl___.
Jim: I don't see h__ else th__ could ha__ wrapped thi___ up. In order to make the plot coherent, they needed to end the love story the way that they did.
data.answer:
阿里:那部电影的结局太老套了。我在一英里外就看到它过来了。我希望编剧们能在情节上多冒点险。
吉姆:我想不出还有什么别的办法能把事情搞成这样。为了使情节连贯，他们需要以他们的方式结束这个爱情故事。
